meanings.definition: A collection of small decorative trinkets or jewelry.
meanings.sent1: She displayed her bijouteries on a velvet-lined tray.
meanings.sent2: The boutique specialized in unique bijouteries for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the bijouteries, creating a sparkly mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her bijouteries were like a treasure trove, each piece holding a special memory.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the bijouteries, casting colorful reflections around the room.

meanings.definition: The art or business of making or selling such items.
meanings.sent1: She learned the intricacies of bijouteries craftsmanship from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The bijouteries industry thrived in the bustling market.
meanings.sent3: His passion for bijouteries led him to open his own jewelry store.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bijouteries, creativity knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The bijouteries trade show was a dazzling display of talent and innovation.
